issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fixVersions.description: Issues that need to be reviewed - do we keep 'em or do we kick 'em?
fixVersions.name: NEEDS_REVIEW

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
For queues (only tested with TextMessage and ObjectMessage) this error appears when rss or atom links are visited

http://localhost:8161/admin/queueBrowse/QUEUE_NAME?view=rss&feedType=atom_1.0
http://localhost:8161/admin/queueBrowse/QUEUE_NAME?view=rss&ffeedType=rss_2.0

{code}
HTTP ERROR: 500

missing ConnectionFactory in QueueBrowserServlet

RequestURI=/admin/queueBrowse/QUEUE_NAME
Caused by:

java.lang.IllegalStateException: missing ConnectionFactory in QueueBrowserServlet

fields.summary: rss and atom feeds cause "missing ConnectionFactory in QueueBrowserServlet"

comments.body: Cannot reproduce this, seems to work fine
